website_summaries.verdict: The best budget option for quality DSLR protective lens cases of different sizes.
pros: Pack of three cases come with individual clips to attach them to belts, vests, bags, or backpacks without taking up extra space
Included microfiber cloth is gentle on lens glass when cleaning
cons: Smallest lens pouch has less padding than the larger two cases in the set

customer_reviews.title: Good lens Covers
customer_reviews.text: These actually deserve a 5 * for quality. These are all little larger than what i needed for my 18-55 and 50-200 Pentax WR lenses. I would have liked slightly snug fit covers but these will work fine too...i am actually able to use the smallest one for both 18-55 and 50-200 lens. You can use the largest pouch for upto 400 mm lens. I know i can fit in Sigma 400mm lens in it. Didn't try other brands though but looks like it will fit fine. Again, quality is good and it should last for atleast 4-5 years in my opinion!!
customer_reviews.author: 1DoctorGenius

customer_reviews.title: A great trio of lens pouches!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice trio of lens pouches. The smaller one fit my 18-55mm lens. The middle one fit the 55-250mm lens. The big one fit the 75-300mm lens. They are very well made and sturdy, cushiony, and no odor whatsoever as some people reported with these neoprene pouches. You can't beat the value! I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fabric over neoprene, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product for a good price. I am adding one star for the price. These fit my lenses well and the stitching is very strong with a nice sturdy strap, but the utility clip is not very large. This is not the thick stretchy neoprene I am used to, but rather a fabric-like texture neoprene that has less stretch. Perhaps it has better wear properties over time? Think "sports equipment" neoprene and not "diving suit" neoprene. See photos for stitching and fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hamar

customer_reviews.title: but for the price they are not bad. also
customer_reviews.text: they are a little smaller and tighter than I was expecting, but for the price they are not bad. also, the belt loop is a little small. it will fit onto a slim belt, like a casual style belt, but definitely not my work/utility belt. my sigma 18-200 OSM barely fits into the medium or the large pouch due to its width, which was the primary reason for my purchase. theres little to no chance a 70-200 lens would fit into the large, if that's what you're looking to do. and the small is pretty darn small. you could maybe fit a 35mm or 50mm prime in there, but again, it'd be tight. 2.5 stars would be more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: TheRuckus

customer_reviews.title: Great for a belt pack
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I first bought these pouches, that they have a super sturdy belt loop! The smallest pouch is too small for any of my lenses, but is perfect for holding hot foot accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: A well made product
customer_reviews.text: the cases are well made and a very good value for the price. Could not make them for $11. They are soft cases and will provide a minimum amount of protection. I used them for storing my extra lenses in the camera bag or backpack. Don't know how well it would protect lens if dropped on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: SunFun48

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Two of the three of these lens pouches are adequate. Thick padding and soft for sufficient protection. The smallest one is pretty useless - doesn't fit any lens that I have. One objection is the very strong neoprene odor of these bags. It's going to take many months before it wears off, or at least I hope it wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice pouches, very well padded. If I ordered again I would stick to the smaller ones as the large one is really big.
customer_reviews.author: webjon

customer_reviews.title: but not a great fit for Nikon D3300 lenses
customer_reviews.text: OK, but not a great fit for Nikon D3300 lenses. None of the three really fits the lenses for my Nikon...small is too tight, medium is too big.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product and all of the sleeves are at good sizes that fit any lenses I threw at them. Really are universal, and have fairly thick padding for moving them around and carrying them around. Would definitely recommend if you don't need a full camera bag and would like to have qucik and save access to your lenses for swapping.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantinos

customer_reviews.title: very useful storage.
customer_reviews.text: Holds my camera accessories and keeps similar items organized in same compartments. Only needed smaller bags, but good price for all. Glad I did. Found a use for all of them. Sturdy. Some smell as mentioned in other reviews, but went away quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rural_FL

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good and appear to be well made
customer_reviews.text: Bags are very tight on my lenses. The small bag is too small for the basic kit lens. Quality is good and appear to be well made, they could just be larger and not so hard to remove the lens from the bag. Bags do not allow for lens hood when reversed and stored on the lens.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The small one is a bit snug for the 18-55mm lenses i have but the large fits perfect on my 55-220mm lenses i highly recommend these it keeps your lenses safe when you travel and it comes with a lenses cleaning cloths you can always use more of those!
customer_reviews.author: cadbury

customer_reviews.title: Good value, odd sizes
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive, good value for the price but odd sized in my opinion. I have various size Canon and Sigma lens, the cases don't fit any of them very well. I kept the cases but bought cases specific to my lenses, perfect fit albeit much more expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and really affordable, they will save you lens. The hook on the side let you keep your lens to hang out of your bag or at your belt. Very well padded it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mikyreale

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not using these for lenses, but they are exactly what I was looking for to clip on to the straps of my backpack for easy access to my small digital camera. It fits snugly in the small, but the medium will give me an easier time getting it in and out. I can use all 3 for different items. Cheaply priced and delivered very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Crfeld

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my lenses
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my lenses. I love the added security of having these pouches in my camera bag. They are also great for storing the lens caps of the lenses I'm currently using.
customer_reviews.author: Myrika

customer_reviews.title: Well made but....
customer_reviews.text: Well made but don't seem to fit my lenses very well. It seems like they are either too big or too tight. I use them but I wish they fit a little better.
customer_reviews.author: FLSTSB

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. And look good too.
customer_reviews.text: 1st these are well made and very nice. But they are a tight fit for my lenses. Others than that they are very nice and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Oeda B.

customer_reviews.title: ButterflyPhoto Neoprene Soft
customer_reviews.text: Well made material and soft enough to cushion if the lense falls from a small height. Good for packing in back packs for hike trips.
customer_reviews.author: DodgeThis

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: technically I got three pouches, but all were different brands and looked nothing like the photos. Overall ok for the price i guess
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection, But The Small One Is Too Small a Diameter To Fit Anything
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for my lenses. But, the small sized one is useless for anything because i'ts too small a diameter to fit a standard sized lens. I'm not sure what it can be used for.
customer_reviews.author: Buying FrenzyTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Great little pouches that are quite durable for low cost
customer_reviews.text: This trio is a god send. Great little pouches that are quite durable for low cost.
customer_reviews.author: spenderella

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Quite larger.
customer_reviews.text: Good products. Surprisingly well made. Quite large. The smaller two I use for lenses the large one I carry my camcorder in if that gives an idea of size.
customer_reviews.author: Rx Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Good additional padding to use inside your camera case
customer_reviews.text: The small is very small. Just large enough for my Pentax nifty 50. Good additional padding to use inside your camera case.
customer_reviews.author: JMarsh

customer_reviews.title: These pouches are made of thick neoprene and are well ...
customer_reviews.text: These pouches are made of thick neoprene and are well stitched together. The closure mechanism works well and can hold the content secured. They are priced very reasonable as well. These pouches are not custom made for any lens in particular, so it's not reasonable to complain that they are too large or too small for your lenses....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quailty, bought a second set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very hand and all at a good price. I ended up buy a second set of these for my other camera accessories.
customer_reviews.author: GaryJames

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be very good unfurtunstelly it was defected. I had to returned it
customer_reviews.author: AndresPosada

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love these - well padded - I feel that my lenses are safe in these. I use the small one for my 50mm and the large for my 28-70
customer_reviews.author: JoyC

customer_reviews.title: Only have used the medium one so far, tall ...
customer_reviews.text: Only have used the medium one so far, tall one to tall for my lenses, short one too short for my lens
customer_reviews.author: johnny101

customer_reviews.title: 3 Pack Neoprene Soft DSLR Lens Pouch Case Kit
customer_reviews.text: Shorter than expected. The large one doesn't close with my 70-200mm 2.8 lens. Very good quality materials and belt clips.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E. Ramirez Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ever had something that fit perfectly to what you planned? Yep, this was one of those. Love it and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Root de Passore

customer_reviews.title: I like the quality of the material
customer_reviews.text: This was worth it every penny. I feel confident this will protect my lens. I like the quality of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Keyai Hatten

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3
customer_reviews.text: Smallest case does not fit my 18-55 lens but others are a good fit for telephoto's
customer_reviews.author: haynesd1

customer_reviews.title: Very Professional!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product. It's really professional and I definitely recommend to all. The delivery was made at the right time.
customer_reviews.author: sagaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smells
customer_reviews.text: The pouches work perfectly for my needs but they do have a strong smell about them. They are getting less smelly or maybe, I am getting use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Shelhamer

customer_reviews.title: The small bag is perfect for the walk around 10-100 lens but the other ...
customer_reviews.text: The small bag is perfect for the walk around 10-100 lens but the other bags are much to big to be truly useful.
customer_reviews.author: Christian F Ponce

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: love them - great deal. The smallest bag fits my qx-100 perfectly, the others work for my NEX gear! I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jon.scot

customer_reviews.title: Diameter too tight - Cannot fit a lens with the hood on (backwards!)
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but the sizes are too tight in diameter to hold the lenses with the sun-hood on (turned "back-wards", obviously). Since I use the hood almost in any occasion as a lens protector - regardless of the sun - after a few months I stopped using them: during event shooting I kept loosing my hoods which were loose in my bag. I tried putting the hood outside the cover, but I would constantly drop them when picking the lens from the bag. Now, I use them only for "long-term" storage. In addition, the stitching is quite poor. I would NOT buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the great quality of the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Garbo9000

customer_reviews.title: Work very well for Sony A6000
customer_reviews.text: I have a new Sony A6000 with the 55-210 and the kit lens. The Sony 55-210 fits perfectly in the medium bag and the kit (16-50) lens fits in the small. Not sure what I will put in the large, but maybe just all the other stuff that I need to carry around. There is a bit of off-gassing that needs to happen in the first few days, so plan ahead so that you are not stuck in a small airless room with these babies for too long. I'm happy to report that once they have a few days to breathe they are much better companions for your camera gear.
customer_reviews.author: PoetDoc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for my lens. The opening is a little tight
customer_reviews.author: KAG

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about the pouches is how tight the top is when trying to squeeze in my lenses. They serve their purpose and are great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: they are great. I am using the Medium inside of the ...
customer_reviews.text: A little thin, but for the Price, they are great. I am using the Medium inside of the Large one to protect a Small Telescope. It works Great!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made product and with the different sizes I am set. I would buy them again if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Warren J. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Reasonable lens protection
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon 18-55mm kit lens or the 55-200mm lens (equal size) fit loosely in the mid sized pouch. Neither fits in the small pouch. Good quality. Reasonable lens protection.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Everything works, well-made, and best for the price. They all have the hard bottom to protect the lens. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Y

customer_reviews.title: 3 Pack Neoprene Soft DSLR Lens Pouchs
customer_reviews.text: These pouches are fabulous and the price is right!!! Would recommend this product this product if your looking for a great case for your lens.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: They are fine
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I thought I was getting. They are fine. They do the job. Hard to get too excited about a case . Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Pouches
customer_reviews.text: I bought these items for my girlfriend new camera and lens, and is very happy with them. I like them too.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: not for us
customer_reviews.text: Sent em back. Too bulky for our needs. Nice product other wise.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day to carry and protect several lens in my photography kit.
customer_reviews.author: wvpattisonphotography

customer_reviews.title: useful pouches that provide decent protection and portability and accessibility
customer_reviews.text: These pouches are nice. I have a 60mm Canon prime macro lens that barely fits into one of the pouches, though. You have to really squeeze it in there, and you wouldn't want to put it into the next larger pouch, as that pouch would be much too big. That being said, the pouches provide decent cushion/protection for the lens and the clip on the pouches allow me to attach them to my belt loops on my pants for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Morris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty big pouches . I could fit a camera (CSC) and the lens in the middle pouch
customer_reviews.author: S. Kon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have my lenses protected until I need them.
customer_reviews.author: james peiffer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and good quality and most of all very affordable with is kind.

customer_reviews.title: Good Cushioning for the lens or accessories
customer_reviews.text: Good price and Good quality, Cushions the lens nicely, can be used for other accessories. Happy with this purchase and exceeded my expectation for the price
customer_reviews.author: Vevish Sukdeo

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice and made of quality material
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and made of quality material. Smallest is a tight fit but other two are very good and fit multiple len sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pouch's!!! Nice and soft for protection. Great draw string to keep them closed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Eikmeier

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cases for the price and can not wait to use them on our next trip. I would recomend these to others.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only the large lens cover offers padding for maximum protection. PB
customer_reviews.author: PEB

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery and good quality. Satisfied customer here. Like the 3 sizes-lens fits with nice room to spare. Would recommend toy friends.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bangert

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: I got these and my initial thoughts were, "great"! As I placed my lenses in them, I grabbed the end piece to draw the bag tight, when the plastic end keeper just fell off in my hand. It is not a big deal for me for they still work and are nice neoprene.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: lots of insulation, I feel my glasses are well ...
customer_reviews.text: lots of insulation, I feel my glasses are well protected. Just the smell is too strong when I open them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality lenses
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality which makes you feel better transporting your special lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hill

customer_reviews.title: Pleasently surprised
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected for the low price. Construction and protection very good.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: These cases were exactly what I was looking for at a much better price than I was expecting! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: G. Camacho

customer_reviews.title: 3 Pack Neoprene Soft DSLR Lens Pouch Case Kit For Canon Nikon Sony Pentax
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT VALUE FOR THE PRICE PAID. VERY HAPPY WITH THE ITEMS. EXCEPTIONALLY GOOD QUALITY, WOULD RECOMMEND TO FRIENDS, FAMILY AND ANYONE WHO MIGHT BE INTERESTED IN PURCHASING SAME.
customer_reviews.author: RAMLALL R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to check out a variety of sizes. Now I can pick the exact ones I want.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN C.

product_meta.title: 3 Pack Neoprene Soft DSLR Lens Pouch Case Kit For Canon Nikon Sony Pentax Olympus Panasonic and Blackmagic Pocket Cinema Camera Lenses Includes 3 Soft Neoprene Lens Pouch, small, medium, and large
product_meta.description:
This Kit Includes Must Have Lens Cases That Will Protect Your Lenses On Your New DSLR

Kit Includes:
1) 8" Neoprene Soft Lens Pouch Large
2) 5" Neoprene Soft Lens Pouch Small
3) 6" Neoprene Soft Lens Pouch Medium
4) ButterflyPhoto Micro Fiber Cleaning Cloth - Safely Removes Fingerprints and Dust, Cleans Without Chemicals

Protect all of your camera lenses with these lens pouches . Water resistant neoprene provides excellent durability; Set of 3 : Small 5", Medium 6", Large 8" . Clip - allows you to attach the pouch anywhere (such as camera bags and backpacks)

Popular Lenses Include: Nikon 18-55mm, 55-200mm, 50mm, 35mm f/1.8G AF-S DX, 35mm f/2D AF, 28mm f/2.8D AF, 24mm f/2.8D AF, - Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II, EF 50mm f/2.5, EF-S 60mm f/2.8, EF 28mm f/2.8, EF 135mm f/2.8, EF 35mm f/2, - Sony 35mm f/1.4, 50mm F/1.4, 85mm F/2.8, 50mm F/2.8 Macro, 100mm F/2.8 Macro, DT 35mm F/1.8, DT 18-55mm F/3.5-5.6, DT 18-70mm F/3.5-5.6, DT 55-200mm F/4-5.6 SAM, DT 55-200mm F/4-5.6, 75-300mm

Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II , EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS II , EF 50mm f/1.4 USM , EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III USM. - Nikon AF-S 50mm f/1.4G SIC SW Prime Nikkor Lens, 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX Nikkor Zoom Lens. - Nikon 60mm F2.8G, 60mm F2.8D, 85mm F1.8D, 20mm F2.8D, 200mm F4D. - Canon 70-200mm F4L, 100mm F2.8L, 70-200mm F4L, 70-300mm, 18-135mm Lens' - Nikon 35mm F1.4G, 70-300mm, 16-85mm, 18-105mm Lens

Nikon 18-200mm, 24-85mm, 180mm, 135mm, 105mm Lens. - Canon 18-200mm, 28-135mm, 15-85mm, 85mm, 50mm, 35mm, 20mm F2.8, 200mm F2.8L II, 180mm, 135mm lens. - Nikon 85mm F1.4G, 10-24mm, 24-120mm, 24-70mm, 28-300mm, 70-200mm VR II, 12-24mm, 16-35mm, 17-55mm, 18-35mm, 24mm, 300mm, 80-200mm, 80-400mm Lens. - Canon 24-105mm, 24-70mm, 70-200mm F2.8, 10-22mm, 17-55mm, 100-400mm, 17-40mm, 28-300mm, 24mm, 300mm, 400mm Lens
feature_bullets: Protect all of your camera lenses with these lens pouches
Water resistant neoprene provides excellent durability; Set of 3 : Small 5", Medium 6", Large 8"
Clip - allows you to attach the pouch anywhere (such as camera bags and backpacks)
ButterflyPhoto Micro Fiber Cleaning Cloth - Safely Removes Fingerprints and Dust, Cleans Without Chemicals

This Kit Includes Must Have Lens Cases That Will Protect Your Lenses On Your New Nikon Df, D7200, D7100, D7000, D5200, D5300, D5100, D3200, D3100, D800, D700, D600, D610, D810, D300S, D90, D3300, D750 DSLR and Canon EOS 5D Mark III, EOS-1D X, EOS 6D, EOS 7D, EOS 60D, T5i, T5, T4i, SL1, T3i, T3, EOS M, EOS 7D Mark II DSLR and Blackmagic Pocket Cinema Camera
